last_episode_to_air.name: Stardust
last_episode_to_air.overview: A visit to the spirit realm forces Rayla to make a heartbreaking choice. Aaravos shares a story from his past with Claudia.

name: The Dragon Prince
overview: An extraordinary discovery inspires two human princes and an elven assassin to team up on an epic quest to bring peace to their warring lands.

seasons.name: Book 1: Moon
seasons.overview: An extraordinary discovery inspires two human princes and an elven assassin to team up on an epic quest to bring peace to their warring lands.

seasons.name: Book 2: Sky
seasons.overview: Rayla and the princes hurry toward Xadia with their precious cargo. But Claudia and Soren are close behind -- and determined to stop them.

seasons.name: Book 3: Sun
seasons.overview: As Callum and Rayla cross into the magical realm of Xadia, Ezran returns to Katolis as king and faces pressure from all sides.

seasons.name: Book 4: Earth
seasons.overview: Two years later, as Claudia ventures deeper into the world of dark magic, Callum, Ezran and friends race to stop her from freeing the powerful Aaravos.

seasons.name: Book 5: Ocean
seasons.overview: The search for Aaravos' prison sends Rayla, Callum and Ezran on an epic journey across land and sea, while conflict roils the Sunfire elves' kingdom.

seasons.name: Book 6: Stars
seasons.overview: As Callum and Rayla set out in search of a way to destroy Aaravos, their friends face the elf's insidious influence in both Xadia and Katolis.

episodes.name: Echoes of Thunder
episodes.overview: As the human kingdom of Katolis braces for an attack by Moonshadow elves, King Harrow makes plans to send sons Callum and Ezran away to a safe place.

episodes.name: What Is Done
episodes.overview: Determined to make up for her mistake, Rayla sneaks into the castle and corners Callum. Lord Viren offers the king a way to survive the attack.

episodes.name: Moonrise
episodes.overview: With night falling, Rayla and the princes race to share what they've found and stop the attack. But first they'll have to get past Claudia.

episodes.name: Bloodthirsty
episodes.overview: Excited about his newfound powers, Callum convinces the others to travel to the Banther Lodge for a magic cube. Katolis prepares to crown a new king.

episodes.name: An Empty Throne
episodes.overview: Callum struggles to control his magic, General Amaya clashes with Lord Viren, and a trip down the river takes a hair-raising turn.

episodes.name: Through the Ice
episodes.overview: After a run-in with a soldier, Rayla leads the princes to high ground. Viren gives Soren and Claudia secret orders as they set out on their mission.

episodes.name: The Dagger and the Wolf
episodes.overview: In a nearby village, Callum and Ezran seek help for the egg while Rayla hunts down a magic blade. Claudia collects ingredients for a tracking spell.

episodes.name: Cursed Caldera
episodes.overview: Ellis leads the friends to the Cursed Caldera but warns it's crawling with nasty monsters. Viren tries to force Runaan to talk.

episodes.name: Wonderstorm
episodes.overview: Ezran, Callum and Rayla each put their special talents to use as they make their way up the mountain in a desperate bid to save the egg.

1.name: Book 1: Moon
1.overview: An extraordinary discovery inspires two human princes and an elven assassin to team up on an epic quest to bring peace to their warring lands.

episodes.name: A Secret and a Spark
episodes.overview: Before marching on toward Xadia, Callum begs Lujanne for a magic lesson, and Ezran tries to teach the dragon prince to fly. But danger is closing in.

episodes.name: Half Moon Lies
episodes.overview: After a fierce showdown with Rayla, Soren and Claudia argue about the best way to deal with the princes. Rayla worries she's kept a secret too long.

episodes.name: Smoke and Mirrors
episodes.overview: Callum searches for a way to tell Ezran the sad news, and Rayla sets a trap for Claudia and Soren. Viren watches a mysterious figure in the mirror.

episodes.name: Voyage of the Ruthless
episodes.overview: After saying goodbye to Phoe-Phoe, the gang teams up with a pirate to cross a bay, where Callum tries to forge a connection with the sky arcanum.

episodes.name: Breaking the Seal
episodes.overview: At the summit of the five kingdoms, Viren fights to win the support of a young queen. Flashbacks reveal a key moment from King Harrow's reign.

episodes.name: Heart of a Titan
episodes.overview: The attack on the Magma Titan has devastating consequences for two kingdoms. In his letter, Harrow shares a lie, a secret and a wish for the princes.

episodes.name: Fire and Fury
episodes.overview: When Soren picks a fight with a dragon, chaos breaks out -- and Rayla faces a difficult decision. A defeated Viren returns to the figure in the mirror.

episodes.name: The Book of Destiny
episodes.overview: Callum pays a price for dabbling in dark magic. Claudia searches desperately for a way to help Soren, and Ezran makes a heartbreaking discovery.

episodes.name: Breathe
episodes.overview: After using his gift to help Claudia, Ezran makes an important decision about the quest. Callum wakes up with a new understanding of primal magic.

2.name: Book 2: Sky
2.overview: Rayla and the princes hurry toward Xadia with their precious cargo. But Claudia and Soren are close behind -- and determined to stop them.

episodes.name: Sol Regem
episodes.overview: To cross into Xadia, Rayla and Callum must find a way past a fearsome dragon who was blinded in a battle with a human.

episodes.name: The Crown
episodes.overview: At his first High Council meeting, King Ezran faces a flurry of difficult decisions. Rayla guides Callum through a wonderland of magical creatures.

episodes.name: Ghost
episodes.overview: Rayla returns home to an alarming discovery, the Sunfire elves decide Amaya's fate, and Claudia confronts her father.

episodes.name: The Midnight Desert
episodes.overview: A mysterious stranger offers Rayla, Callum and Zym a ride across the Midnight Desert. With Katolis in danger, Ezran makes a startling announcement.

episodes.name: Heroes and Masterminds
episodes.overview: Rayla and Callum race across the desert to find Nyx. As Katolis prepares for war, Ezran gets help from an unlikely source.

episodes.name: Thunderfall
episodes.overview: On the march to Xadia, Viren reveals how Avizandum, the Dragon King, met his end. Phoe-Phoe takes Ezran on an epic journey.

episodes.name: Hearts of Cinder
episodes.overview: As Team Zym begins the steep climb up to the Dragon Queen's lair, Viren and Aaravos play a nasty trick on the Sunfire elves.

episodes.name: Dragonguard
episodes.overview: With Viren's glowing army closing in on the Storm Spire, Rayla, Callum and friends must decide whether to flee to safety or stay and fight.

episodes.name: The Final Battle
episodes.overview: Determined to save the Dragon Prince at any cost, the friends brace for a fiery showdown with Viren -- who still has a few surprises up his sleeve.

3.name: Book 3: Sun
3.overview: As Callum and Rayla cross into the magical realm of Xadia, Ezran returns to Katolis as king and faces pressure from all sides.

episodes.name: Rebirthday
episodes.overview: Two years later, Claudia finally completes her resurrection spell, Ezran plans a surprise for Katolis, and Janai takes Amaya on a secret mission.

episodes.name: Fallen Stars
episodes.overview: Facing another journey up the steep Storm Spire, Viren panics. Janai's brother pushes back against her plans. Callum attempts to decode the mirror.

episodes.name: Breathtaking
episodes.overview: An unexpected visitor leaves Callum reeling. Soren puts on a show to welcome the dragons  while in Xadia, his sister searches their lair.

episodes.name: Through the Looking Glass
episodes.overview: The story of Aaravos's dark past comes to light. Claudia prepares to open the chrysalis. The tension between humans and Sunfire elves boils over.

episodes.name: The Great Gates
episodes.overview: While Ezran and team set out on a quest to visit the Archdragon of Earth, Claudia and Viren try to communicate with the mysterious being.

episodes.name: The Drakewood
episodes.overview: Zym helps the friends search the forest for a missing Soren. In the Sunfire elves' camp, Queen Janai calls a tribunal to decide the architect's fate.

episodes.name: Beneath the Surface
episodes.overview: As N'than guides the heroes through the treacherous Path of Despair, Soren tries to convince Claudia to change her ways.

episodes.name: Rex Igneous
episodes.overview: At last, the friends come face to face with the mighty dragon  only to discover he's expecting gifts. Karim hatches a plot to dethrone the queen.

episodes.name: Escape from Umber Tor
episodes.overview: Dark spells, dirty tricks and a very unusual map ignite a fiery confrontation in Rex Igneous's lair. Janai squares off against her brother.

4.name: Book 4: Earth
4.overview: Two years later, as Claudia ventures deeper into the world of dark magic, Callum, Ezran and friends race to stop her from freeing the powerful Aaravos.

episodes.name: Domina Profundis
episodes.overview: While Ezran awaits an audience with the Archdragon of the Ocean, Rayla hunts for answers about her parents, and Callum hits a roadblock in his research.

episodes.name: Old Wounds
episodes.overview: Worried by Claudia's relentless pace, Terry dreams up a creative solution. Rayla and Callum set out for Lux Aurea. Ezran prepares to address the dragons.

episodes.name: Nightmares and Revelations
episodes.overview: Callum and Rayla arrive in Xadia to find royal wedding planning in full swing. Claudia and Terry make their way down the river while Viren sleeps on.

episodes.name: The Great Bookery
episodes.overview: As Callum scours Lux Aurea's library for lore of the Startouch elves, Amaya clears the air with Rayla. Karim meets a powerful potential ally.

episodes.name: Archmage Akiyu
episodes.overview: Ezran convinces the group to look for an eccentric ocean mage with critical information. Karim calls in a debt. Claudia tries to communicate with Viren.

episodes.name: Bait and Switch
episodes.overview: In search of seaworthy transportation, Rayla leads the way to an unsavory port town run by a cunning elf. Claudia takes a stand.

episodes.name: Sea Legs
episodes.overview: The Ruthless sails into dangerous waters, with Finnegrin in hot pursuit. Queen Janai and her guards face a deadly infiltrator seeking the Sun Seed.

episodes.name: Finnegrin's Wake
episodes.overview: Held captive aboard the Sea Legs, Callum and his crew must dig deep to win their freedom. Janai faces her brother once again.

episodes.name: Infantis Sanguine
episodes.overview: While Zubeia fights for her life and Viren arrives at a crossroads, the race toward Aaravos' prison leads those who seek him deep beneath the waves.

5.name: Book 5: Ocean
5.overview: The search for Aaravos' prison sends Rayla, Callum and Ezran on an epic journey across land and sea, while conflict roils the Sunfire elves' kingdom.

episodes.name: Startouched
episodes.overview: A shocking reversal leaves Claudia grief-stricken. Home in Katolis, Callum, Rayla and Ezran debate what to do with the Pearl that imprisons Aaravos.

episodes.name: Love, War and Mushrooms
episodes.overview: Soren travels to Xadia, where he and Corvus follow a mysterious trail into the woods. Janai faces her frustrations  and her future.

episodes.name: The Frozen Ship
episodes.overview: On their journey to the Starscraper, Rayla and Callum spend a chilly night at an unusual campsite. Terry offers Claudia some comfort.

episodes.name: The Starscraper
episodes.overview: The Celestial Elves greet Callum and Rayla with a puzzling prophecy. Karim presents a gift to Sol Regem. Soren returns home to a surprise.

episodes.name: Moonless Night
episodes.overview: To prove themselves as the Chosen Two, Rayla and Callum set out to end the storms swirling around the Starscraper. Viren tries to right past wrongs.

episodes.name: Moment of Truth
episodes.overview: Memories of Soren's childhood weigh heavily on Viren. Kosmo uses his new powers to help Callum see his true self clearly.

episodes.name: The Red Wedding
episodes.overview: Sol Regem emerges from his long exile  on Janai and Amaya's wedding day. Hoping to make peace with Karim, Ezran rides into danger.

episodes.name: We All Fall Down
episodes.overview: Callum and Rayla head to the Moon Nexus. When Katolis faces a devastating attack, Soren turns to an unlikely source for help.

episodes.name: Stardust
episodes.overview: A visit to the spirit realm forces Rayla to make a heartbreaking choice. Aaravos shares a story from his past with Claudia.

6.name: Book 6: Stars
6.overview: As Callum and Rayla set out in search of a way to destroy Aaravos, their friends face the elf's insidious influence in both Xadia and Katolis.
